articles.title: DNA technology reveals more information about oldest human mummy found intact - CNN
articles.description: The latest DNA technology has helped scientists uncover more information about what is considered to be the oldest human mummy found intact.  They say “Ötzi the Iceman” was dark-skinned and likely balding. Michael Holmes reports.
